venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
The Boston WordPress June 2009 Meetup will be our first to feature a formal presentation.

Kevin Leary, WordPress professional, web designer and web developer (kevinleary.net), plans to discuss the following topics:

Get Found: SEO & SEM For WordPress
  • Extending SEO with Plugins
  • Packaged SEO For WordPress: The Thesis Theme
  • Analytics and Tracking
  • Optimize Your Writing for Search Engines
  • Get People Talking
  • General SEO Best Practices
  • Review Case Study's and Working Examples


Power a website, not just a blog: Using WordPress as a CMS
  • Why WordPress? Isn't it for blogs?
  • Extending WordPress
  • I don't want my site to look like a blog
  • Review Case Study's and Working Examples



Affiliate Marketing and WordPress
  • Generating Revenue Through Affiliates


(Topic list is subject to change.)
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the 10th Floor Commons (same place as last time)
item.name: Boston WordPress June 2009 Meetup
